name: Ybyrá
description:
The last tree of the forest is in danger! The fire creatures want to burn it down. You must save it!

 

In Ybyrá, you are Sprout, a magical being created from the power of Ipe, the ancient tree from a mystical forest.

Your job is to protect the Ipe from waves of enemies so they don't burn it.

Your job is to protect the Ype from waves of enemies so they don't burn it. They have burned all the forest and you are the last hope!

 

It's a difficult task, are you up to the challenge?

 

[Controls]

 

[WASD] -> Movement

[Spacebar] -> Dash

[Mouse] -> Aim

[Mouse left button] -> Shoot

[P] -> Pause
